title: BBC Local Live: Essex on Tuesday, 10 May 2016 - BBC News
summary: murder investigation launched after pregnant woman injured in fire at block of flats near southend dies .
conservative group on southend borough council strikes deal with ukip to take control of the authority .
braintree town manager danny cowley will talk to lincoln city about their vacant managerial role .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: that 's it from us at essex live - thanks for stopping by .
we 'll be back at 08:00 tomorrow with the latest news , sport , travel and weather for essex .
have a great evening .

documents.title: weather : mild and damp tonight
text: tonight will be mild and damp with further outbreaks of rain across the county , which again will turn heavy at times .
minimum temperature : 12c ( 54f ) .
it 'll be a cloudy and mostly dry start tomorrow , but it will gradually turn brighter through the morning .
get can stay up-to-date with the latest forecast at bbc weather .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: southend independent leader will not resign despite conservative-ukip deal
text: the independent leader of southend borough council , ron woodley , told me he will not resign from his role .
he said although it looked likely he and the independent-led coalition would lose power , he would force the conservatives to table a motion to remove him .
it comes as bbc essex learned the tories had struck a deal with ukip to run the authority after no party gained overall control at thursday 's elections .
author: Simon Dedman
BBC Essex political reporter

documents.title: typhoon jet confirmed for both days of clacton airshow
text: today it has been confirmed the typhoon jet will be making an appearance at clacton airshow .
the royal air force fighter will feature on both days of the event , which takes place on 25 and 26 august .
earlier in the year it was confirmed the famous red arrows will also flying .

documents.title: tendring councillor cautioned by police for swearing at man in the street
text: a tendring councillor filmed swearing at a man in the street has been cautioned by police .
michael skeels ( recorded being abusive at william hones , who used to be a member of ukip .
mr skeels left ukip to join the conservatives before forming the coastal independents .
essex police said a 69-year-old man from st osyth was voluntarily interviewed and given a caution for committing a public order offence .

documents.title: in the news : vigilante victim 'kept virginity photos ' flowers laid in tribute to westcliff flat fire victims
text: if you 're just joining us , here are our top stories for the county :
author: Nick Alliker
BBC Essex

documents.title: your swans and cygnets in stanford rivers
text: you and i may be sheltering indoors today , but these swans and their cygnets are loving it down in stanford rivers .
one 's even hitching a ride !
thanks to bbc weather watcher `` maximus '' for sending his .
us .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: parents asked to keep an eye on children on busy seafront
text: police have asked parents of small children to stay alert after officers dealt with many reports of missing children in southend during the weekend 's hot snap .
ch insp simon anslow told me at one point on sunday his officers were trying to find eight children - that 's more reports than they had of missing mobile phones .
`` as a parent myself i wonder how you find yourself in a situation where you 've lost such young children in an area where the risk [ of doing that ] is obviously so high , '' he said .
`` we just need to keep some of those preventable things to a minimum so we can deal with the stuff that 's more crime-based . ''
author: Chris Flynn
BBC Essex

documents.title: darren kelly murder : victim 'kept images of young people '
text: the victim of an alleged vigilante gang murder `` kept images of people wanting to lose their virginity '' , a jury heard .
darren kelly ( 42 , from basildon , was kicked , punched and stabbed to death near his home last october .
a group of four denies his murder and is currently on trial at chelmsford crown court .

karim khalil qc , representing the now 16-year-old girl accused of luring mr kelly to his place of death , said mr kelly had used `` at least four aliases '' when using the whispr messaging system and on one occasion had pretended to be the daughter of a former partner .
the trial continues .

documents.title: essex 's tour match against sri lanka abandoned due to rain
text: essex 's tour match against sri lanka in chelmsford has been abandoned due to continued rainfall .
the game was declared a draw after only two days play was possible .
essex will next be in action on sunday when they host derbyshire in their fifth county championship match .

documents.title: thieves steal hundreds of pounds worth of garden furniture and ornaments from retirement complex
text: `` disgraceful '' thieves stole hundreds of pounds worth of furniture and ornaments from a retired housing complex .
author: Basildon Echo

documents.title: roger hirst : it 's not about bobbies on the beat
text: the newly-elected conservative police and crime commissioner for essex says he has no plans to put more `` bobbies on the beat '' .
speaking on bbc essex , roger hirst said he hopes to improve response times and police visibility by encouraging officers to work outside the office .
`` if they 're doing their paperwork via remote devices , such as in a cafe where people can talk to them , then they 'll have a much better presence , '' he said .
@ hirst4essexpcc tells @ twitterid it 's not about 'bobbies on the beat ' , it 's about response times .
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid some 'bobbies on the beat ' in thundersley at the moment would be lovely , thank you very much .
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid people ask for bobbies on the beat , but he knows better .
give them what they want
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid complete contradiction in tweet , if more bobbies available on the beat response times would be less
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid not that old chestnut again !
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid proactive beats reactive every time .
you need both
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid if they were 'on the beat ' they can respond faster ?

documents.title: southend united : franck moussa unsure where he 'll be playing next season
text: southend united midfielder franck moussa is unsure where he 'll be playing his football next season .
moussa scored in sunday 's loss at bury - his first goal since he rejoined the club in march .
the belgian is now a free agent and open to a contract offer from the manager phil brown .
`` all i will do is make sure i 'm ready for whoever wants to have me so i can perform straight away , '' moussa told bbc essex sport .
author: Ben Fryer
BBC Essex sport

documents.title: flowers laid in tribute of westcliff flat fire victims
text: flowers have been laid outside the grampian block of flats in balmoral road in westcliff .
it 's after a 30-year-old woman and her unborn child died after a fire on the ninth floor here on saturday .
essex police has since launched a murder investigation .
a bunch of flowers with the words `` gone too soon '' have been fixed to the railings outside , along with a white cross .

documents.title: weather : showery rain with the chance of thunder
text: this afternoon will be mostly cloudy with outbreaks of showery rain .
there will be heavy downpours at times , with the risk of thunder too .
maximum temperature : 18c ( 64f ) .
you can get the latest forecast for your part of essex here .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: in the news : pregnant woman and unborn child die in tower block fire conservatives set to take control of southend borough council after ukip deal
text: if you 're just joining us , here are your top stories for essex this lunchtime :
author: Nick Alliker
BBC Essex

documents.title: essex police officer 'shocked and appalled ' at fatal westcliff flat fire
text: ch insp simon anslow told bbc essex he was `` shocked and appalled '' at the death of a mother and her unborn baby following a fire in a tower block in westcliff .
officers are working to assess if the blaze at the balmoral road flats on saturday night was a targeted attack .
`` this is a tragic and terrible incident .
whoever was responsible may have suffered minor burns or returned home with the smell of smoke on their clothes , '' he said .
author: Chris Flynn
BBC Essex

documents.title: your sunday 's sunset in kirby-le-soken
text: if today 's weather has left you longing for sunday 's sunshine , we can briefly relive it with this photo taken in kirby-le-soken over the weekend .
it was sent to us by dan manning .
we love seeing your from around the county - you can send them to us via email , twitter or facebook .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: covers remain on in chelmsford
text: no play has taken place this morning in essex 's tour match against sri lanka .
update | covers remain on and it is still raining .
lunch is to to be taken at scheduled time of 1pm and the situation will be assessed then .

documents.title: 'too late ' to investigate clacton by-election spending claims
text: essex police says it ca n't charge anyone with breaking rules on election expenses during the 2014 clacton by-election because too much time has passed since any alleged offences took place .
officers started an investigation after channel 4 news claimed in february there were irregularities over the conservatives ' spending , which the tory party denied .
however , the relevant piece of law , the representation of the people act , has a 12-month limit for matters to be reported , and so no prosecutions can be brought .
the force says it is considering applying for an extension on time to investigate .
author: Ian Puckey
BBC Essex

documents.title: police assessing if westcliff fatal fire was a 'targeted attack '
text: essex police are assessing if a fire that killed a pregnant woman and her unborn child on saturday was a `` targeted attacked '' .
speaking on bbc essex , ch insp simon anslow said : `` the fire was set in a communal area close to the victim 's door '' .
mr anslow appealed for anyone with information about saturday 's blaze at the balmoral road flats in westcliff to come forward .
author: BBC Essex

documents.title: unborn child also killed in westcliff flat blaze , police confirm
text: the unborn child of the pregnant lady who died in hospital days after a blaze at a block of flats in westcliff could also not be saved , essex police have confirmed .
a 30-year-old woman , who was in the late stages of her pregnancy , died yesterday after the fire on the ninth floor of the balmoral road flats on saturday .
ch insp simon anslow ( family are now having to come to terms with their devastating loss . ''
the force has launched a murder investigation .

documents.title: woman cancels holiday after car 'keyed ' in leigh
text: a woman from leigh-on-sea says she has had to cancel her trip abroad to pay for damages to her car which was `` keyed '' all over .
stacey mcconville-reynolds , who only moved to the area on saturday , found her car covered in scratches after leaving it parked overnight in a nearby street .
she told bbc essex : `` i was in disbelief - gobsmacked .
i 've had to pay nearly £ 500 in excess .
i was supposed to go to barcelona yesterday but could n't go . ''

documents.title: firefighters simulate 'horrific ' a12 road crash
text: more than 15 firefighters have tested how they would respond to a `` horrific road accident '' on the a12 .
the exercise , which took place in lexdon , simulated casualties trapped in cars halfway down a ditch by the side of the road .
you can see a full gallery on the fire service 's facebook page .

documents.title: man found with puncture wound to abdomen in walton high street
text: a man was found with a puncture wound to his abdomen in walton high street last night , police say .
the 26-year-old attended the premier shop at about 21:15 .
his injuries are not thought to be life-threatening .
a man , 25 , was arrested on sus of wounding with intent , but was later released without charge .
officers are now trying to establish a motive .

documents.title: essex gang problem down to 'successful ' met police crackdown
text: the new police and crime commissioner for essex says a rise in gang crime in the county is partly down to a successful campaign by the metropolitan police .
roger hirst , conservative , said criminals , particularly from east london , had been `` forced '' to cross the border .
`` we need to learn from them [ the met ] , and i 'm sure they 'll be prepared to help us understand what they 've been doing so successfully , '' he said .

documents.title: essex continue to dominate sri lanka in tour match
text: essex have continued to dominate their tour match against sri lanka .
after declaring on 412 for 4 in their innings , essex have reduced the tourists to 42 for 2 .
sri lanka will resume their second innings on day three 116 runs behind - however , looking at today 's forecast there is n't much hope of play at the moment .
welcome from a wet & overcast chelmsford # essvsl
@ twitterid people say chelmsford is the driest county hq in uk , but surely this mantle has to go to bristol as no rain at all in 2016

documents.title: conservatives set to take control of southend borough council after ukip deal
text: the conservative group on southend borough council has struck a deal with ukip to take control of the authority .
essex has been told ukip will back the tories on certain key issues like votes on leadership and budget .
the deal gives the conservatives control of the council for the first time in two years .
author: Ian Puckey
BBC Essex

documents.title: danny cowley to hold talks with lincoln city over vacant managerial role
text: braintree town manager danny cowley says he will talk to lincoln city about their vacant managerial role .
but , less than 48 hours after their national league play-off defeat , he told me he is not in the right frame of mind to make an `` intelligent decision '' just yet .
fellow national league side lincoln made an approach yesterday .
author: Ben Fryer
BBC Essex sport

documents.title: weather : a cloudy and wet day , with the risk of thunder
text: today will be mostly cloudy with outbreaks of showery rain throughout .
there will be heavy downpours at times , with the risk of thunder too .
maximum temperature : 18c ( 64f ) .
you can stay up-to-date with the latest forecast with bbc weather .
author: Kate Kinsella
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: headlines : pregnant woman dies following westcliff flat fire conservative group takes control of southend borough council
text: here are the top stories for essex this morning :
author: Sonia Watson
BBC Essex

documents.title: westcliff flat fire murder investigation : what we know so far
text: here 's what we know so far about the flat fire in westcliff-on-sea , which has now turned into a murder investigation :

documents.title: police seek witnesses in westcliff flat fire murder investigation
text: essex police is asking witnesses or anyone with information that could help its murder investigation to contact 101 or email : scdappeals @ essex.pnn.police.uk .
we 'll bring you more on the murder investigation throughout today .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: pregnant woman dies following westcliff flat fire
text: a 30-year-old woman from southend was taken to hospital with life-threatening injuries following a fire on the ninth floor of a block of flats in balmoral road , westcliff , on saturday evening .
essex police says she died yesterday evening .
the fire is being treated as sus the force is investigating the circumstances leading up to the incident .
a murder investigation has now been launched .

documents.title: breakingmurder investigation launched after pregnant woman dies
text: we start this morning with some breaking news .
police have launched a murder investigation after a pregnant woman , who was injured in a fire at a block of flats in westcliff , died in hospital last night .
more to follow .
